name: Gravity Grab (vincart, lolour0, Isabelle, Yoonaa, Arees, Siliver)
name_original: Gravity Grab (vincart, lolour0, Isabelle, Yoonaa, Arees, Siliver)
description:
★ PLAY ★

Gravity Grab is a 1v1 shooter in which you try to eject your friends off of the arena you’re fighting in into the deadly lasers around ; all the while floating in the zero gravity environment of an alien planet.

Use your trusty grappling hook fly across the map and launch rubble around in order to overwhelm and push your enemy out of the arena. 

Think in advance! In order to make sure the other player flies out of the arena, you need to analyze the environment around you and then push the advantage by getting rid of your opponent’s possible escape. 

Invite a friend on local with a computer-share app such as parsec or team viewer and show them whose skills are superior. 

★ KEY FEATURES ★ 

➫ Simple controls and a straightforward gameplay.

➫ Easy to play, hard to master! 

➫ Low poly stylized graphics made with love and care. 

➫ A true zero gravity feeling. 

➫ 2-Player local co-op. 

➫ Full controller support. 

➫ SPAAAAAACE!!! 

★ CONTROLS ★

Warning: This game cannot be played outside of local play and needs a keyboard and a gamepad/controller to function.

★ ABOUT US ★

A game made by :

➫ Artists : Jeremy Matias Carneiro, Emilie Bousquet, Harold Prevost de Saint Cyr, Isabelle Goubinskaya.

➫ Development and Game Design : Louis Gegout-Stover, Arthur Joanin.
